Sentencas: The design principle of a specially adapted solid-oxide fuel cell power plant for the production of electricity from hydrocarbons without the emission of greenhouse gases is described.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: To achieve CO(2) separation in the exhaust stream, it is necessary to burn the unused fuel without directly mixing it with air, which would introduce nitrogen.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: Therefore, the spent fuel is passed over a bank of oxygen ion conducting tubes very similar in configuration to the electrochemical tubes in the main stack of the the fuel cell.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: In such an SOFC system, pure CO(2) is produced without the need for a special CO(2) separation process.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: After liquefaction, CO(2) can be re-injected into an underground reservoir.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: A plant simulation model consists of four main parts, that is, turbo-expansion of natural gas, fuel cell stack, periphery of the stack, and CO(2) recompression.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: A tubular SOFC concept is preferred.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: The spent fuel leaving the cell tube bundle is burned with pure oxygen instead of air.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: The oxygen is separated from the air in an additional small tube bundle of oxygen separation tubes.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: In this process, mixing of CO(2) and N(2) is avoided, so that liquefaction of CO(2) becomes feasible.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: As a design tool, a computer model for tubular cells with an air feed tube has been developed based on an existing planar model.
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis

Sentencas: Plant simulation indicates the main contributors to power production (tubular SOFC, exhaust air expander) and power consumption lair compressor, oxygen separation).
Titulo: Clean combined-cycle SOFC power plant - cell modelling and process analysis
